plasma: Halin kwayoyin halitta wanda ya ƙunshi barbashi da aka caje (ions da electrons)
ionic: Bond kafa ta jan hankali tsakanin sabanin caje ions
covalent: Bond kafa ta hanyar raba electrons tsakanin kwayoyin halitta
karfe: Bond kafa ta janyo hankali tsakanin tabbatacce karfe cations da delocalized electrons
daidaita daidaito: Daidaita sinadarai tare da daidaitattun lambobi na atom na kowane nau'i a bangarorin biyu
tawadar Allah: Naúrar da aka yi amfani da ita don auna adadin wani abu (yawan barbashi na Avogadro)
lambar taro: Jimlar protons da neutrons a cikin tsakiya na zarra
lambar atomic: Adadin protons a cikin tsakiya na zarra (yana ƙayyade ainihin nau'in)
isotop: Atom na kashi ɗaya tare da lambobi daban-daban na neutrons
oxidation: Asarar electrons daga zarra ko kwayoyin halitta
raguwa: Samun electrons ta hanyar zarra ko kwayoyin halitta
redox: Chemical dauki shafe duka hadawan abu da iskar shaka da kuma rage matakai
kuzarin kunnawa: Mafi ƙarancin kuzarin da ake buƙata don halayen sinadarai ya faru
mai kara kuzari: Abubuwan da ke ƙara ƙimar halayen sinadarai ba tare da an sha ba
thermodynamics: Reshen sunadarai wanda ya shafi zafi, aiki, zazzabi, da kuzari
endothermic: Halin sinadarai wanda ke ɗaukar zafi daga kewaye
exothermic: Maganin sinadaran da ke sakin zafi zuwa kewaye
